title: Como en mi Casa Art Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Italian, Organic, Salad bar, Juice bar, Take-out, Fusion, Non-veg
description: Serves fish, veg options available. Almost exclusively vegetarian, with vegan and gluten free options, has tuna fish by request in salads. Small coffee shop with an artistic ambiance created solely with recycled materials. Has vegan and gluten free choices which include cakes, wraps, snacks, pancakes, jams and more. All dishes are in-house-made using organic local products. A variety of Costa Rican coffees are prepared Italian style. Located downtown on the second floor with a view of the Caribbean Sea. Next to the organic market on Saturday morning. Free Wi-Fi.
